metadata.name: Cali Barnes
metadata.description: Anime Gang: Specials is a limited edition collection containing signature hand-drawn illustrations from the Anime Gang universe. The Specials include character illustrations from the lore, twitter banners, covers of the manga chapters, and custom artworks from collaborations with celebrities and influencers. This collection builds up over time with every subsequent season and event that becomes part of the universe. The Specials are available as airdrops for Anime Gang holders, collectors and partners.
